_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: Eya jhesus hodie / Natus est de uirgine

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Blyssid be that mayde maryBorn he was of here
                    body…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Onto that chyld may we calleVllo sine
                    crimine
